item.description: • Optimized for iOS 17, iPadOS 17, and macOS 14 • Set window title for current folder • Remove Twitter from Settings
• Optimize interface for Mac • Fix slideshow keyboard navigation • Require macOS 11
• Fix updating folder title when renaming changes its position • Fix About screen for Macs with M1
• Optimized for iOS 15, iPadOS 15, and macOS 12 • Keyboard navigation (iPadOS 15) • Drag and drop words, folders as text

• Korean beginner vocabulary • Korean vocabulary pack • New Words Slideshow interface • Favorites Widget • Shuffle • Search (iOS) • Export folders as CSV • Add keyboard shortcuts to Create/Edit/Duplicate Word screen/window • Fix menus configuration (macOS) • Fix Create/Rename folder dialog memory leak
• Optimized for macOS Big Sur • Update Edit Word interface

• Update contextual menus • Add swipe down gesture to dismiss words slideshow • Add tap/click square/star to update words in list • Add Settings bundle (iOS) • Update settings icons (iOS) • Update File menu (macOS) • Split Settings view into Preferences and About windows (macOS)

• Show words slideshows modally • Mac toolbar • Optimized for iOS 14 • Add keyboard shortcuts (switch tab, new folder, new word, go to previous/next word, favorite, check) • Add “Review on Mac App Store”, “Discover My Other Apps” in Settings screen (macOS) • Fix readable width for Discover Order screen
• macOS app • iCloud sync • Autocapitalize folder name in Create/Edit Folder dialog
• Improve Dark Mode support • Improve Dynamic Type support • Improve Buy button layout in Store screen • Open Twitter profile in native app if available • Fix cell deselection in Settings screen
• Optimized for iOS 13 • Dark Mode support (iOS 13) • SF Symbols (iOS 13) • Discover My Other Apps in Settings • Native App Store review request • Update to Swift 5 • Require iOS 13
